title: TDS MobileSiginSys
description: A perfect & easy to use plugin for unreal engine This plugin help you to Sign In easily in unreal engine
longDescription:
A perfect & easy to use plugin for unreal engine

This plugin helps you to Sign In easily to Unreal engines


FirebaseAuthPlugin is a powerful and user-friendly plugin designed for Unreal Engine developers to seamlessly integrate Firebase authentication into their projects. With FirebaseAuthPlugin, developers can effortlessly implement secure user authentication across a variety of platforms including mobile, Android, and VR environments.


**Key Features:**

1. **Easy Integration:** FirebaseAuthPlugin offers a simple and intuitive interface for integrating Firebase authentication into Unreal Engine projects, allowing developers to focus on creating immersive experiences without worrying about complex authentication logic.


2. **Multi-Platform Support:** Whether you're developing for mobile devices, Android platforms, or virtual reality environments, FirebaseAuthPlugin provides robust support for a wide range of platforms, ensuring consistent authentication experiences across different devices and platforms.


3. **Flexible Authentication Methods:** Developers can leverage FirebaseAuthPlugin to implement a variety of authentication methods supported by Firebase, including email/password authentication, social media sign-ins (Google, Facebook, etc.), and more, giving users the flexibility to choose the authentication method that best suits their needs.


4. **Event-Driven Architecture:** FirebaseAuthPlugin employs an event-driven architecture to handle authentication events such as successful sign-ins, sign-outs, and authentication failures, allowing developers to easily respond to these events within their Unreal Engine projects.


5. **Customizable User Interface Components:** FirebaseAuthPlugin provides customizable user interface components such as login screens, buttons, and widgets, enabling developers to quickly integrate authentication UI elements into their projects with ease.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  One Click Sign-in System
  •  Profile Picture URL
  •  Profile Username
  • Profile Email

Code Modules:

  •  Runtime
  •  GameTime
  •  Editore Mobile

Number of Blueprints: 7

Number of C++ Classes: 5

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Window - Android - VR

Supported Target Build Platforms: Window - Android - VR

Documentation: Link

Important Notes: This plugin requires Firebase & Firebase JSON for the sign system
